nodes.text: Guile Company was a unit of Clawdites during the Yuuzhan Vong War. The shapeshifting Clawdites allied with the New Republic during the war, serving as an intelligence unit behind Yuuzhan Vong lines. Despite a high casualty rate, Guile Company kept receiving new volunteers. However, Clawdites who had children were disallowed into their ranks, though some hid the fact they had children from the unit. The company remained intact after the end of the War.
